content:
The army of the Russian Federation attacked the village of Zmiivka, Kherson region, as a result of the shelling was killed by a local resident.

About thisinformsHead of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin.

According to him, in the morning, Russian invaders struck the village of Zmiivka, in Beryslav region.

“A 57-year-old resident came under fire. Unfortunately, the man suffered fatal wounds, ”said Alexander Proudin.

As reported by the Armyinform, in ZaporozhyeThe number of dead increasedas a result of rocket strokes of the Russian Federation.
title: As a result of a hostile blow to Kherson region, a man was killed
description: The chief of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin informs about it. According to him, in the morning ...
author: Army Inform
